website_summaries.verdict: Slim to save space, chic-looking, velvet-lined hangers with swivel hooks, in black or ivory.
pros: Sturdy, nonslip velvet-covered plastic hangers for suits, dresses, pants, accessories
Durable hangers hold up to 10 lbs
cons: Some complaints of black lint shedding onto clothing and some hangers breaking easily

customer_reviews.title: These hangers are great because the felt texture prevents your clothes from sliding ...
customer_reviews.text: These hangers are great because the felt texture prevents your clothes from sliding off the hanger. I have bought the same hangers in stores in the past and I got these because I was redoing my closet and it looked good having everything on the same style hanger and having shirts stay in place on the hangers. The only negative I noticed is If I tried hanging slacks (folded in half) over these, the non-slip felt made it difficult getting the slacks on and off the hanger, so I stuck with plastic hangers for my slacks.
customer_reviews.author: Lydia B.

customer_reviews.title: The velvet is shedding
customer_reviews.text: Had to return the hanger because the velvet was shedding. From the plastic bag, you can tell that the velvet has shed and if you put different color clothes except black, you can see the black velvet on your clothes. Very dissapointed!
customer_reviews.author: QJ

customer_reviews.title: Should be considered disposable
customer_reviews.text: The way they function is great — velvet keeps clothes from slipping off, which is great for rain jackets etc. for me, and silver things for my wife — BUT they should be considered disposable. The metal hook is barely anchored Into the plastic of the body, and breaks off very easily even if you're just pulling your clothing out from other clothes that squeeze it a little, or if you don't fully clear the hook from the rod as you're pulling it out. Does not take much at all. So, I'll use these til they go, but I'll be finding another version of this same thing that's more durable.
customer_reviews.author: xmasthecat

customer_reviews.title: Excellent customer service and product!
customer_reviews.text: I received the set of hangers and it was my third set I have purchased from the seller and everything has been fine except for three showed up broken in the box. Before I could contact the seller, the seller actually contacted me and asked me if everything was OK with my order! I really appreciated that so that is why I’m giving it a five star review because they were quick to ask me how my order was and they are replacing the three broken hangers, Plus I love the hangers themselves! My clothes fit much better in my closet now. They are thin but durable!
customer_reviews.author: Sweething4203

customer_reviews.title: Fuzzy hanger are strong but slow
customer_reviews.text: These hangers lose a point for one of their strongest attributes. I'm used to plastic hangers that slide into a shirt as slick as dish soap on porcelain. The fuzzy coating, which keeps garments from slipping around on the hangers, makes them more difficult to get into the garment and position for hanging. The don't break like the plastic hangers. I think they'll last well. The first time you try to swivel the hanger neck, you might think they don't turn, but they do swivel. Once you decide you don't mind taking your time positioning an item on the hanger, they're okay. We have about a hundred-fifty of these things in use now.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth R. Harrod

customer_reviews.title: Durable and look great
customer_reviews.text: I wiped mine down before using them however they didn't shed nearly as much as I expected them too. By the time I was done I had an extremely light dusting on my cloth. They are thin but they've held up very well for me these last couple weeks. None of them came broken or in bad shape. They do swivel which I like. But the swivel isn't loose like you might be used to with cheap department store hangers, so you don't have to worry about your hanger swiveling around when you're rummaging through your closet. Overall, I think they're great hangers that look really nice and would recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Shanda

customer_reviews.title: I like these hangers
customer_reviews.text: I like these hangers. They are great for things with wide necks or spaghetti straps...things that fall off of regular hangers. When combined with the skirt clips, you can plus size skirts with ease. They work well in the coat closet where you don't always want to zip up the coat. They aren't so great with button-down dress shirts. It just takes longer to get the shoulders straight. They also don't hang on my oven door well. Yeah, that's a problem that's most likely unique to me & where my tiny laundry room is located. Overall, love the product. I'm considering gifting some to the local drama department.
customer_reviews.author: Boots

customer_reviews.title: The Best deal for Shirt/Pants Velvet hangers (period)
customer_reviews.text: You simply cannot find a better deal for Shirt and Pants velvet hangers for cost value and quality than this set. I've looked everywhere because hangers can get expensive for even just a few. Some physical stores had lesser (it seemed) quality for far fewer (6 pack) hangers for just under $10- that's crazy! With this pack you get 50 high quality velvet hangers for BOTH pants and shirts for UNDER $20. Fast shipping also- Got the pack in just a couple days! Triple 'A' deal! Amazing Awesome Amazon deal! Thanks 👍
customer_reviews.author: H. Hamood

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite thing
customer_reviews.text: These hangers are a thin velvet, and I absolutely love how well my clothes stay put on them. I also didn’t realize just how much room my old plastic hangers too up in my closet! These hangers are about a third of the thickness, and I now have a lot more room. I wish I would have bought hangers like this years ago. I absolutely love them—and they make for a perfect gift for yourself or for the person who is hard to shop for.
customer_reviews.author: Dana Morningstar

customer_reviews.title: Do a fine job of keeping clothes on the hanger.
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought these hangers a few years ago for my travel trailer because I got tired of picking up all my clothes from the floor of the closet whenever we went anywhere. They have done a fine job of keeping the clothes on the hangers under all but the roughest driving conditions. I enjoyed them so much I bought more hangers for home and found they do a lovely job of not only keeping my silkier tops from sliding off the hanger, but in keeping the shoulders in place and therefore minimizing shifting around and wrinkling. I ordered this most recent batch because my husband and I decided we want to replace all our hangers with these.
customer_reviews.author: Linda A. Marlia

customer_reviews.title: I got these hangers so my clothes wouldn't fall off the hangers!!!
customer_reviews.text: They work wonderfully! They are sturdy enough so I don't worry that they will break. I have even put coats on them. No longer do rayon slinky blouses fall on the floor or slide to the wrong position. Everything sits still, and because they are so slim, I find I can put more in my closet without fear of wrinkling. I even take my clothes, still on the hanger and put them in the suitcase and they arrive just fine. ..even by plane! Great purchase. They also arrived in a very timely manner, well protected in a box!
customer_reviews.author: Gwen Gorospe

customer_reviews.title: You Are Going To Love These Hangers!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these hangers and will never use any other kind again. This was my second purchase. The first set I bought over a year ago still look brand new. No matter how slinky the clothes are, they never fall off so no more searching for your favorite top on the closet floor. They are also sturdy enough for heavier clothes. I have never had one break or bend. Buy these hangers. You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Melody Flynn

customer_reviews.title: These hangers are very fragile. Just from the shipping ...
customer_reviews.text: These hangers are very fragile. Just from the shipping 2 of them came already broken and a few broke after the first use which I think is not normal for regular hangers... I won’t reorder this product again.
customer_reviews.author: MBRISE

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Product!
customer_reviews.text: --If this review helped you, please click "helpful"-- These hangers are great! They all arrived in tact - not one was broken! The velvet hangers are my favorite! They're not bulky like wooden and plastic hangers can be and don't create bumps as some hangers can. These have little indentations for strappy tops, too! I'm slowly but surely replacing all hangers in the house with theses gems! Definitely buy these! They're the best velvet hangers for the price I've found on Amazon! --For more Amazon reviews, follow @CassandraMercedes on Instagram--
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra Mercedes Hanes

customer_reviews.title: A Good Value
customer_reviews.text: The hangers were delivered as promised. I read previous reviews regarding a shedding problem. SO I vacuumed each before placing clothes on them and so far I have not noticed a problem. There was some “fuzz” left on a laundry bag that I had set the hangers on temporarily. A soft brush removed all traces of the fuzz. DON’T try water first! I bought black hangers for dark clothes and ivory hangers for light colored. The four stars were given because I’ve not had them long enough to give five stars.
customer_reviews.author: Vonne

customer_reviews.title: Nice Velvet Hangers
customer_reviews.text: I’m getting rid of the old big plastic & bringing in a mixture of new space saving hangers. These velvet hangers are nice. Clothes hold on no doubt. Very much a closet space saver. 1 thing I don’t care much about~which wasn’t worth giving only 4 stars~is the velvet hangers make it a bit more difficult to get the clothes off compared to other non-velvet space saving hangers. Just something to keep in mind. Despite that I’m overall happy with these hangers & would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: meshelle

customer_reviews.title: Work as intended
customer_reviews.text: People complain about them being hard to use, and yes, they take more time to because you can't just run the garments up and down the arms, you have to carefully move the fabric away from the hanger because IT'S DESIGNED TO GRIP. That's the point, your clothes won't fall off of these. I purchased 4 packs and they were all shipped perfectly. Reading previous reviews I was willing to get a few broken or missing ones, but was pleasantly surprised. I also didn't experience any extra fuzz rubbing off onto my clothes like some others mentioned. Overall, I love these hangers even if it takes a couple extra seconds in the morning to remove the clothes from them.
customer_reviews.author: khaosstar

customer_reviews.title: Where are the hooks?
customer_reviews.text: I am sorry but these were not satisfactory. I have been buying these from Amazon for probably one to two years and each of the hangers I bought before had a little hook in the middle so that you could hang another one, two, or more hangers in a straight line down in your closet. The obvious reason is to save space! I could not tell from the picture on Amazon if it had those hooks so assumed they did. I took a chance and was disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth McMillen

customer_reviews.title: Great deal for quality hangers
customer_reviews.text: I love the uniform look in my closet. No issues with black fuzz coming off on my hands or clothes. Chiffon tops don't slip off. A good price for 50 hangers and I'll be putting more clothing in my closet rather than in drawers.
customer_reviews.author: CM King

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these hangers to free up room in my closet and to help me better organize my closet. Both objectives have been totally met. I love these hangers. What a great add to my closet. Also they hold my clothes really well - no falling off or slipping off. I recommend the hangars and the seller who got them to me, via Amazon, really quickly and in great condition.
customer_reviews.author: Mystery Fan

customer_reviews.title: Great Hangers
customer_reviews.text: They're great and really put my closet in order. The last thing that would cross my mind would be buying coat hangers. But the disorder in my closet and my subsequent ranting over never being able to find anything prompted me to make my move, with the nudging from my far more organized wife. The clothes don't slip off the hangers, pants don't slide to one side and get wrinkled, the hangers won't bend and they end up saving space because of their shape and uniformity. It's one less aggravation in life, well worth he price.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Roeder

customer_reviews.title: Exactly What I Wanted & Needed.
customer_reviews.text: My closets needed help. They were so crowded and, as a renter, ti's not like I can do a major renovation. The solution: change the size of my hangers. Use skinny hangers and standardize them. I've bought this type of hanger here and there before and loved them. My clothes never slip off the velvet hanger sliding down to the (possibly) dusty floor. But being able to buy these fab hangers, in bulk, on Amazon was perfect. They arrived package, in groups, wrapped in plastic, then packed in a very sturdy box within a box. I never left my house which was surrounded by 14" of snow. . LOVE.
customer_reviews.author: cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Sleek, work great with tanks, dresses, polyester tops
customer_reviews.text: Awesome hangars. I am buying a second pack because I like them so much. I decided I needed more durable hangers in my closet, so I upgraded from all my plastic hangers. These hold tank tops, T-shirts, dresses, and polyester tops great. They can be a little difficult to pull out of tight necked tops though. Very happy with them. They are much heavier duty than plastic hangars but just as light. And they look really nice in my closet
customer_reviews.author: Capricaa

customer_reviews.title: Does What is Needed
customer_reviews.text: These are not the strongest hangars in the world, but I knew that when ordering. I had some just like them and they’re strong enough to hold up anything I wear, so I ordered them. They just fine and I will most likely order more.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and flat
customer_reviews.text: These hangers are the best. I wish I would have purchased them years ago. Clothes do not slip off of them plus the are slimline so there is more room in the closet. They are sturdy. I saw someone commented that they break but I haven't broken one yet. They are not flimsy but I wouldn't hang a heavy item on them like a motorcycle leather but other jackets, sweaters and coats I do. They only thing is clothes don't slide on them so it takes a few extra steps to get a top to sit on the hanger correctly but it's really no bother. I recommend these hangers. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Dag

customer_reviews.title: Great hangers
customer_reviews.text: I really like the hangers that I purchased. They do well gripping my clothes on the hanger and make my closet look neater with uniformity. The only thing I dislike about them is that in doing well at keeping my clothing from slipping off they can make sliding the hanger off my clothing somewhat difficult
customer_reviews.author: pj

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: These hangers are great for the price. Clothes stay on without slipping. They are a little thinner than the brand I bought at Kohls, however, the hook on this brand is a lot sturdier.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Gillespie

customer_reviews.title: Love these hangers!!
customer_reviews.text: These hangers are prefect!! Price is much better that BB&B for exact same product. I didn’t have any issues with the black coming off on my clothes but I did run a lint roller over them a few times before I used them. Definitely ordering more so I can do my entire closet!!
customer_reviews.author: J Jones

customer_reviews.title: Not a speck of shedding.
customer_reviews.text: My whole course matches now. My uniform shirts are bright white, so I panicked the first time I put them on these hangers. I didn't want to spend the work day picking off black fuzz... But they're wonderful. Sturdy enough for jeans and heavy clothes, plus completely non slip, so even dresses stay put. And there's been no shedding. Wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Hopkins

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: I love these hangers. They work so well! Things don’t slip off and they are slim so they don’t take up a lot of space. I can even hang strapless shirts on them. The velvet grips on awesome and they were so much cheaper than alternatives. I’ll probably buy more and switch out all of my hangers.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Hangers for minimalist closet
customer_reviews.text: I found these same hangers at Sam’s Club for $7 less. Aaarghh. Well I bought it online during the peak of the COVID-19 breakout. So let’s write off the price difference as the price of convenience. They’re good. Using them for a youngsters closet. Hope they stay intact/sturdy?
customer_reviews.author: Dandelion 🌼

customer_reviews.title: As described
customer_reviews.text: They break sometimes (my boyfriend is rough with them) but cheap enough to replace when needed. No weird smell, no lint, etc
customer_reviews.author: Mae

customer_reviews.title: Double your closet capacity!
customer_reviews.text: These hangers are slim and allow you to fit many more items in your closet compared to conventional hangers. The Velvet covering stops silky items sliding off. Cross bar makes hangers suitable for pants as well and tops and dresses. The 360 swivel in a bonus feature that allows the hook to rotate around allowing quick organization on the hangers.
customer_reviews.author: Tori P.

customer_reviews.title: Great, sturdy hangers
customer_reviews.text: This is a great deal on durable hangers instead of cheaping out on those plastic ones that break super easily, and the velvet makes clothes cling to it so they don't fall off all the time. Only downside is something it can be annoying to get clothes on the hanger because it doesn't just slide in with ease.
customer_reviews.author: Jazztastic

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful to hold on to clothes even plus size.
customer_reviews.text: Must have. I love these hangers. I'm a plus size woman and it's hard to find hangers to hold my clothes without them falling off. These work wonderfully. Thin and lightweight. Which opens more space in my closet. The velvet holds on to even the largest items.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie McConnell

customer_reviews.title: Great for hanging blouses and shirts!
customer_reviews.text: These hangers are wonderful for hanging blouses and anything you don’t want slipping off the hanger. They aren’t bulky. So your closet looks very neat. I’ve had them for a month. They look like they will be sturdy. The other great thing, they don’t leave lint on your clothes.
customer_reviews.author: The Learning Guru

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware...
customer_reviews.text: My mistake in ordering these. My grandchild was reorganizing their closet and I thought these hangers would be perfect. Not true. When I arrived at my daughters house and saw a so many hangers were not used I was surprised... until I saw this. Broken hangers ....cheaply produced...these can not even hold a lawn cotton shirt.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Bass

customer_reviews.title: 49 arrived, 48 unbroken
customer_reviews.text: These are full-sized velvet non-slip hangers. Like some others on here I received less than 50 and one was broken upon arrival. I'm not seeing a lot of shedding right out of the box and they seem to do well holding shirts. I'm not sure I'll use these for pants since one arrived already broken and that makes me question their durability.
customer_reviews.author: SimplySky

customer_reviews.title: Stop watching clothes slip off their hangers and buy these
customer_reviews.text: Moved recently with about half of my garments hung in wardrobe boxes on these and they arrived perfectly. I can’t say the same for the garments on other hangers. These are great to store, they are completely flat together when storing flat or hanging, and are so soft I can even hang my sweaters. Will be buying more!
customer_reviews.author: Andi Kurtz

customer_reviews.title: Like a lot of women I have an abundance of ...
customer_reviews.text: Like a lot of women I have an abundance of clothes and not a lot of room for them all. These hangers are slim and not bulky so they don't take up a lot of space in my closet. Also, the non-skid velvet coating is amazing because my clothes remain on the hanger and do not slip off like plastic hangers. Bottom line, they are functional and make storing my clothes quick and easy. I will be making a another order very soon. Thank You
customer_reviews.author: Taronga Ellison

customer_reviews.title: Leaves black residue all over the place!!!
customer_reviews.text: My hangers arrived damaged & broken & they leave black residue on light-colored fabrics! I do not recommend these hangers!!! 1 of the hangers fell on the area rug in my closet & left black marks! These ARE NOT PREMIUM & NOT WORTH THE PRICE!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn’s Hacks

customer_reviews.title: Work great!
customer_reviews.text: Love how these look! They hold stubborn shirts, skirts and pants in place! I’m converting my whole closet to these. Great find and cheaper than I have found locally! Check out my Instagram for more pics of this item and other Amazon finds I am loving!!! kimberly_Misfits_Fashion
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly- Misfits Fashion

customer_reviews.title: Thin and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These hangers are thin and comfortable for my closet. They are perfect for dresses, shirts, jackets, everything. I have upgraded my closet to all of these hangers instead of the big bulky plastic ones and it feels like there is more room in my closet and the clothes move much more freely. I highly recommend these hangers
customer_reviews.author: Natasha

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: These work nicely for holding the clothes in the closet. I like that the clothes don't slip off of them and the hanger head rotates, which makes laying out clothes for the next day easy, just hang it in the back of the door.
customer_reviews.author: ANNRB

customer_reviews.title: This is either the 3rd or 4th order I have placed for these hangers!
customer_reviews.text: They are literally the best. You will not find a better price for the quantity and they are durable enough to work for anyone's needs. I do have a really heavy winter jacket in our front entry way that I hang with two hangers. Saves so much room in a closet. You really need these!!!
customer_reviews.author: E. Wozniak

customer_reviews.title: good!
customer_reviews.text: i appreciate these hangers because they’re so affordable and great for slippery pieces of clothing! fortunately, i have not experience the awful shedding most reviews of mentioned, but these hangers will snap if not careful. (don’t mind the way i hang my clothes haha it’s to keep track what i don’t wear so i know to throw out)
customer_reviews.author: tori

customer_reviews.title: Shirts stay put.
customer_reviews.text: There a lot of reviews about this product attaching to your clothes but I actually like that about it. It is a bit difficult to put your clothes on the hanger at first but once it’s on there and at the right position it stays. I bought these to hang up all of my shirts to see them better and they work well with everything. Very non-slip. I recommend it if you have a lot of blouses and shirts you’d like to hang. I only gave 4 stars because I’m not sure of the durability because I just received them.
customer_reviews.author: Sonal Mistry

customer_reviews.title: The best!
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered these great handlers twice and I'm sure I'll need more. I want to eventually replace all my old hangers with these. They are wonderful. Well-made and will last forever. I like them because they're skinny and work very well with the hanger system I use. You can also purchase the clips if you want to hang skirts or slacks. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mary M. McCoy

customer_reviews.title: Not durable, but they swivel
customer_reviews.text: Great value, and the metal does swivel from the hanging part itself. But, the hangers are pretty flimsy and have a tendency to crack if flexed too much. I notice the metal breaking off from the hanger part itself on a few of my hangers.
customer_reviews.author: SAW

customer_reviews.title: Clothes do not slip off of these hangers.
customer_reviews.text: I love these hangers. I've converted my entire closet to these. All of my plus size clothing clings to them and nothing ever slips off of them. Plus they make my closet look completeley organized. I have ordered a total of 200 hangers over the past few months. I want to give these hangers 5 stars. But 3 out of the 200 hangers arrived broken. Non have broken since I've owned them. But that is the reason for my score.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy Fuentes

customer_reviews.title: Durability?
customer_reviews.text: It is thin and so the durability could be questioned but overall it’s great. I may have bought more than I should have but then that just means I need more clothes (great excuse to go shopping). I didn’t realize it’d be hard to put clothes on because of the friction? But I mean, that’s kind of a given that there’s be more friction. Just prepare to take the extra five seconds trying to put it on 😂
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina Kay

customer_reviews.title: Very poor quality
customer_reviews.text: These are very fragile. They arrived with the hook part of the hangar broken off one of them. Two more have broken in the couple days I've had them. Very poor quality. Save your money and buy something better.
customer_reviews.author: Freyja Joy

customer_reviews.title: Saves room
customer_reviews.text: I have no closet in my bedroom, I have 2 nice closets I bought for me and my husband, mine is very full, but these hangers are so much thinner than my plastic one's, I have same amount of clothes, but more room now, and your clothes stay on the hanger just the way you put them on, love them
customer_reviews.author: Monica Bertsch

customer_reviews.title: These practical hangers keep closets neat
customer_reviews.text: I’ve bought these hangers twice for our two closets because I like them so much. First of all, I like that the clothes stay on the hanger and don’t slip off. That way the closet stays neater. Second of all, I like that a lot more clothes fit in the closet because the hangers are so thin. The closet looks so much neater because all the hangers look alike. I also bought the matching clips so that I could hang pants and skirts.
customer_reviews.author: ChicaP

customer_reviews.title: No more wire hangers!
customer_reviews.text: Hangers arrived well packaged and on time as promised. Quality appears to be good, docking one star for one hanger cracking down the center after minimal use. Replaced al hangers in our closets with these, they really do make the closet look nicer.
customer_reviews.author: M. Sobolewski

customer_reviews.title: Thin and good grip
customer_reviews.text: Love these hangers! I ended up getting two sets! My clothes don't slide of them and they are not bulky like regular hangers! I would 100% recommend!
customer_reviews.author: JWoohoo101

customer_reviews.title: I think that this is a very good product. Love the way the hanger keeps the ...
customer_reviews.text: I think that this is a very good product. Love the way the hanger keeps the clothes from slipping off of them. They are particularly great for tanks or slippery items. I have never seen it done before, but it would be nice to have hangers that could be sized. My clothes are mainly a size small, and the length of the hangers are still going to create a “bump” into the sleeve. I would have preferred to have the hanger curve at the shoulder seam or be and inch or two shorter.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my side of the closet. I no longer have shirts that fall off the hanger when looking through my clothes. There is less space taken up and it looks nice. I will definitely be purchasing more to finish my closet. I ordered more and can fit so much more into my closet and items do not fall off when searching through!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonMOM

customer_reviews.title: Really makes the closet look better!
customer_reviews.text: While preparing to sell my house the realtor recommended that I order these hangers to replace all the ugly old ones that I have been using for years. My closet looks much neater and more uniformed.
customer_reviews.author: luluohio

customer_reviews.title: Keep Your Clothes on Their Hangers
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these hangers. So many times my "silky" blouses and dresses would slide off their hanger and end up on the floor of the closet. These hangers keep every garment right in place. An added advantage is that the hooks on these hangers are thinner than those on the plastic hangers I was using. That creates more space in my closet as the clothes fit closer together. I will be purchasing more of these.
customer_reviews.author: Judith Ramsey

customer_reviews.title: LOVE these. Gained a lot of space in closet ...
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these. Gained a lot of space in closet because hangers are thin. Strong enough to hold everything. A little awkward to hang skirts, even with the clips. I ended up just folding them over the hanger. Maybe there is better solution but I didn’t look too hard. Otherwise absolutely perfect. Would most definitely buy again!!
customer_reviews.author: skatz

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: I love them because they are almost identical from the ones I bought from Costco, but the price is so competitive, I don't have to buy 200 at a time from the warehouse. Works out great!
customer_reviews.author: C4

customer_reviews.title: best feature - they take half the space!!
customer_reviews.text: I have always have very nice clear plastic hangars - but my closet was very crowded. With the black velvet hangars I can fit so much more in. I gave away all my very nice clear plastic hangars and switched all my closets to all black vet - both singles for blouses and shirts and what I call doubles (for pants)
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Hangers for the Price
customer_reviews.text: Really like these hangers. I bought both black and white. Clothe don't slip. Hold pants and blouses. Great for hanging and for drying clothes as well. Finally, they don't take up a lot of room in the closet.
customer_reviews.author: Becky Alvarez

customer_reviews.title: These are some good hangers I'm glad that I purchased this I just ...
customer_reviews.text: These are some good hangers I'm glad that I purchased this I just went to Kroger's today and they wanted $5 before tax for 6 of these hangers. **UPDATE**: The silver part, the hook, comes completely out of the hanger and cannot be fixed. I've thrown away 2 or 3. I don't know if it was the heaviness from my coats or jackets, maybe, so I won't hang my coats or jackets on them any longer.
customer_reviews.author: RoseFromConcrete

customer_reviews.title: Sleek and Durable
customer_reviews.text: These hangers are great for my dresses. The straps don't fall down. They have also created a nice organized look in my closet. I'm happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very useful notched feature.
customer_reviews.text: This review is from Mrs. KL, not JL, her husband. These are just perfect, IMHO. They have taken a good idea (velvet-like texture on the hangers) and made it better by adding those useful little notches The velvety surface on similar hangers sold on a famous home shopping network helps keep items on the hangers, but thin straps and certain other clothing characteristics require added clips or notches. I prefer notches, as clips tend to go astray. I wish these came in a neutral color as well, although black is very serviceable.
customer_reviews.author: K. Lockwood

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: Nice hangers that save space in closet! Disappointed that I saw similar hangers at Walmart for lower price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Yep that'll do it
customer_reviews.text: Honestly wanted these for aesthetic, but they do create much more space in the closet. Also, my clothes *stick* to them with static or something, which is weird to get used to but nothing slides off of them, even my giant wrap thing on the far left.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: I love my new hangers
customer_reviews.text: These hangers are awesome! I am a short female so to hang my clothes up on my top rack is challenging. It was so frustrating to go through all the effort to hang my clothes and to have it later fall down because I grabbed the clothes next to it. Also the straps of my dresses don't fall off the hanger anymore so I don't have to be a hoodini to wrangle all my straps 3 times to stay on the hanger. I will be ordering two more sets!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Only 1 out of the 50 hangers had no hook
customer_reviews.text: These hangers are sturdy and the velvet material hasn't come off so far. I ordered these almost a month ago and finally unpacked them all. I was surprised to find that only 1 out of the 50 hangers came with no hook. I guess the assembly line ran out of hooks. Other than the one, I'm happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love, Love these Hangers
customer_reviews.text: These hangers are great. None of my clothes slide of the hangers. My old plastic hangers let my clothes fall off all the time. These are the best. I highly recommend these hangers.
customer_reviews.author: L. Hawes

customer_reviews.title: Great additions to my closet
customer_reviews.text: The hangers all arrived intact. None broken. That's a bonus because shipping can be rough on these types of hangers. They fit right in with ones I paid more for in the past. My only negative is that there is no swiveling. That's not deal breaker for me because none of my other ones swivel either.
customer_reviews.author: DQ101

customer_reviews.title: I feel like I'm being ripped off and taken advantage of and ...
customer_reviews.text: The hangers are ok. A couple have already broken after taking a shirt off of them ONCE, but I guess that will happen out of the 150 that i've purchased. What I'm upset about is that I have reordered this item twice, from the same seller and each time they have raised the price! I feel like I'm being ripped off and taken advantage of and that irritates me. For that, I rate the seller 2 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Wolf

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Hangers
customer_reviews.text: I love these hangers! Nothing slips off. They take up less room in the closet, which means room for more clothes. I needed more and didn't want to go to the store so ordered off Amazon. Arrived quickly.
customer_reviews.author: K. Foster

customer_reviews.title: Best hangars ever!
customer_reviews.text: I recently moved, so I decided to replace all my hangers with these ones. The velvet does a great job preventing the clothes from falling off; it does make it harder to slip an article of clothing off quickly, but it is a price to pay for a neat closet. The hangers are thin, so it helps to consolidate space. Despite being thin, these are very sturdy and could hold a winter's coat (though I would recommend getting heavier wooden hangers for coats). The best thing about these is that they come in at $0.50 each, which is significantly better than other products out there. Overall, I am very satisfied with these hangers!
customer_reviews.author: Satya

customer_reviews.title: LuLaRoe must have to keep clothing secure on the hanger
customer_reviews.text: Pro: I use these type of velvet hangers for all my LuLaRoe clothing. They don't slip off in the closet. I also add clips to these so I can hang four pair of leggings per hanger. It is worth it to buy larger amounts once you find out how well they keep the clothes in place. Con: Seller repeatedly sending me emails to review this product.
customer_reviews.author: Luvs Oregon

customer_reviews.title: Hung up on these hangers.
customer_reviews.text: Great set of hangers. Size is perfect as I am a big guy, and the hangers are sturdy. With the velvet coating there are no clothes landing on the floor. 2nd review-- great hangers, have received my second order.
customer_reviews.author: Allink

customer_reviews.title: Purchased two packages (100 hangers) for my closet. Moved ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased two packages (100 hangers) for my closet. Moved into a condo with limited closet space. Installed a custom closet, then used these when I found my other hangers were too bulky and needed to increase my storage capability beyond what was designed. Could be I have too many clothes given I had to purchase two and still have seasonal items in rolling containers under my bed!
customer_reviews.author: Annie Speaks

customer_reviews.title: Great Hangers
customer_reviews.text: The hangers arrived just as described. They seem to be good quality. They hang nicely in my closet and don't take up as much room as the round plastic hangers I was using before. These are great and I may be buying more once I get all my clothes transitioned over to them.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff C

customer_reviews.title: Who knew...I'm in love with these hangers.
customer_reviews.text: I was extremely tired of picking my dresses and tops up off the floor because they slid off the hanger. These hangers were suggested to me so I decided to give them a try. I ended up ordering two more boxes and added my pants to the list of clothing I will never have to pick up off the floor. I highly recommend them if your clothes slide off of metal or plastic hangers. They are well made.
customer_reviews.author: Judi Abbott

customer_reviews.title: Love the hangars
customer_reviews.text: Hangars are great. No more of my husbands pants slipping of on the floor. I have a number of skirts that I hang on hangars but the regular hangars do not hold them well and they slip off on the floor. This does not happen any more. Love the hangars.
customer_reviews.author: Bendite

customer_reviews.title: Love these hangers!
customer_reviews.text: I air dry most of my clothes and these hangers work so well. Even with wide-neck shirts, you can position then on the hanger so they don't stretch too much and stay in place. Even when placed out on a windy day, the clothes don't come off the hangers!
customer_reviews.author: Anne L

customer_reviews.title: Space savers!
customer_reviews.text: I love these hangers and have converted to only using these. They are space saving, clothes don't slip off of them and they make the closets look so much tidier. Yes, I began using when "tidying up" became all the rage and am sticking to it!
customer_reviews.author: PattyH

customer_reviews.title: Space savers
customer_reviews.text: Using these hangers will save at least 1/3 of your closet space. Not too keen on the clips that are used for 2 pc outfits, but this order didn't include clips so that's a moot point. Great hangers!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great hangers
customer_reviews.text: These work very well. They all come uniform in size and appearance, and have no issue supporting even my heaviest motorcycle leather jackets. Additionally, the velvet does a great job of "holding" all my clothes - I have no fear of shirts slipping off, even when no buttons are fastened. They look great in the closet and add a refined look to all my closets.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Barton

customer_reviews.title: I love these hangers! Great price too!
customer_reviews.text: I first bought the hangers on Black Friday. Then I told my mom about them, and ordered the hangers for her. Now that we have guests and tons of coats to hang up, I bought another box. 50 hangers for $20. Fantastic quality. They don't break like a plastic hanger does. They don't get weak in the middle like a wire hanger does with the cardboard for pants. Great hangers!
customer_reviews.author: F. Kugelman

customer_reviews.title: Love them.
customer_reviews.text: Good for the price but I accidentally break these all the time. It’s a metal hook screwed into a hard plastic hanger covered in velvet so they break at the connection part all the time but I think that’s just because I am kinda rough with them. I love these though. And suuuuuuuper cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Lone

customer_reviews.title: Hang em.. hang em all!
customer_reviews.text: Im a big girl.. and my shirt neck line usually has a big opening cuz big girls show boobies... unless u have a turtle neck... anyway.. they shoulder stay in place altho it is annoying to not be able to just slide it right off... catch 22.. damned if u do... damned if u dont... It hangs well.. what more can i say
customer_reviews.author: Tessa

customer_reviews.title: So fragile
customer_reviews.text: These break so easily, just putting clothes in and out of you closet will break them. Super frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Monkeywench

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: Great price on great hangers. Clothes stay on very well (almost too well when I'm lazy and just try to pull them off!). Will buy again if I need more. :)
customer_reviews.author: B. McRae

customer_reviews.title: The Best hangers I have ever used.
customer_reviews.text: These hangers are wonderful. They are thin so they give more closet space. They don't leave marks in my knits and sweaters like regular hangers do. Clothes don't slip off like regular hangers and end up on the closet floor. A great product.
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: So much more space means more clothes!
customer_reviews.text: Makes my closet have so much more space! Keeps my clothes from slipping and neat!!! Love love love, now I have to order more for my husband! Hope this helps!! ❤ C. Hamilton
customer_reviews.author: C.Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Lots of hassle and lint
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for a dorm room thinking the narrow hangers would allow for extra hanging space. They are so fuzzy they stick to clothes making it hard to hang clothes. These leave black lint on your clothes.
customer_reviews.author: Product Review by Kris

customer_reviews.title: Not 50.  4 packs of 12 is only 48
customer_reviews.text: I loved these hangers and they improved my closet substantially. However, I ordered 2 sets of 50 and each 50 was 4 sets of 12 which is 48 hangers not 50. So actually I received 96 hangers instead of 100, so I took off one star.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy or Dennis Dickinson

customer_reviews.title: A good buy
customer_reviews.text: I am glad I bought these. They are non-slip. Very effective. They do not leave any residue on my hand or on the clothes. The velvet does make it a little harder to take the clothes off the hanger. They don't slip off easily (I suppose that is the point). They look good and are sturdy. I bought 50 and not one is broken or damaged (yet).
customer_reviews.author: DiscriminatingBuyer

customer_reviews.title: I LIKE THEM!
customer_reviews.text: I like them very much. Sometimes, it is a bit of a struggle to get an item ON the hanger but it is just as difficult for it to slide off of the hanger and onto the floor. They seem to be sturdy and they are much more compact than the plastic hangers. Plus, they are all the same size.
customer_reviews.author: Ava H.

customer_reviews.title: Great! Sturdy, dependable hangers.
customer_reviews.text: These are great! I wanted to switch hangers to this slim-fit type, to save space in my closet. I ordered this pack to try it out, especially since I like the solid black color. I was slightly nervous opening the packaging since some of the fuzzies from the hangers fell off, but NONE have gotten onto my clothes, which is great. They are sturdy, light-weight, and look good in both a closest and on a free-hanging rack. I also like that you get 50 at a time, which is a perfect amount, espeically in smaller closet spaces.
customer_reviews.author: Maddie M.

customer_reviews.title: Perfection
customer_reviews.text: These hangers are absolutely great! It helped condense the space in my closet, prevented clothes from slipping off, and the hooks turns 360 degrees smoothly. It did leave ALITTLE black velvet residue on clothes, but it DIDNT stain any of my clothes what so ever and it definitely wasn't anything of a big deal to knock off one star. I also haven't experienced a broken hanger yet and the package came quick with 50 as promised.
customer_reviews.author: Kenny

customer_reviews.title: Clothes stay put
customer_reviews.text: I read a lot of reviews with people complaining of the velvet rubbing off into their clothes, but i have yet to have a problem with that. The hangers are durable and thin, which allows me more space in my closet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer
